name: Design Critique Template
description:
A design critique is a safe space with fellow designers to evaluate and improve work through rigorous and healthy dialogue grounded in the objective.


Critique builds shared perspectives and values, leverages the strengths of the entire design team, and drives iteration and improvement.


Use this template as the starting point for each presentation.


Recommended naming convention


[firstname-lastname | project-name]-[mm/dd/yyyy]-design-crit
